Html:
I got the following errors with my fo file:

System.SystemException: System.SystemException: Error in column-width property v
alue 'NaNin': No conversion defined
   at Fonet.FonetDriver.FireFonetError(String message)

butes attributes, FObj parentFO)

es attlist)

   at Fonet.FonetDriver.Render(XmlReader inputReader, Stream outputStream)

ogram.cs:line 78

et\Fonet\Program.cs:line 31

 

The fo file worked just fine by using java fop.jar lib. Is there any work around for FO.NET?

-Henry
